source.e7c7c963:

appl_data["CODE_GENDER"].value_counts().plot.pie(autopct='%1.1f%%'  , startangle=45, shadow =True)
plt.legend
plt.title("Gender Distribution" , fontdict={'fontsize' : 15 , 'verticalalignment' : 'baseline' })
plt.show()

source.187fb5f3:

sns.countplot(appl_data["CNT_CHILDREN"],hue=appl_data["TARGET"])

source.929dbe9c:
fig = plt.figure(figsize=(14,10))
plt.scatter(appl_data[appl_data["TARGET"]==0]['AMT_ANNUITY'],appl_data[appl_data["TARGET"]==0]['AMT_CREDIT'],s=35,color="g",alpha=.9,label="REPAYER",linewidth=.5,edgecolor="k")

plt.scatter(appl_data[appl_data["TARGET"]==1]['AMT_ANNUITY'],appl_data[appl_data["TARGET"]==1]['AMT_CREDIT'],s=35, color="r",alpha=.7,label="DEFAULTER",linewidth=.5,edgecolor="k")
plt.legend(loc="best",prop={"size":18})
plt.xlabel("AMT_ANNUITY")
plt.ylabel("AMT_CREDIT")
plt.title("Credit Amount VS Annuity Amount" , fontdict={'fontsize' : 20 , 'verticalalignment' : 'baseline' })
plt.show()

plt.title("Companion v/s Target")
plt.subplots_adjust(wspace = .6)
